member.name: F:Waher.Events.EventType.Alert

member.name: T:Waher.Events.Log
member.summary: Static class managing the application event log. Applications and services log events on this static class, and it distributes them to registered event sinks.

member.name: M:Waher.Events.Log.Register(Waher.Events.IEventSink)
member.summary: Registers an event sink with the event log. Call to unregister it, or at the end of an application, to unregister and terminate all registered event sinks.
member.param: Event Sink.

member.name: M:Waher.Events.Log.Unregister(Waher.Events.IEventSink)
member.summary: Unregisters an event sink from the event log.
member.param: Event Sink.
member.returns: If the sink was found and removed.

member.name: M:Waher.Events.Log.RegisterExceptionToUnnest(System.Type)
member.summary: Register an exception type to unnest in logging. By default, only the is unnested.
member.param: Type of exception to unnest.

member.name: M:Waher.Events.Log.Terminate
member.summary: Must be called when the application is terminated. Stops all event sinks that have been registered.

member.name: E:Waher.Events.Log.Terminating
member.summary: Event raised when the application is terminating.

member.name: M:Waher.Events.Log.Event(Waher.Events.Event)
member.summary: Logs an event. It will be distributed to registered event sinks.
member.param: Event to log.
